results.question: In the "Shrek" film franchise, Donkey is played by Eddie Murphy.

In "Gravity Falls", what does Quentin Trembley do when he is driven out from the White House?
results.correct_answer: Eat a salamander and jump out the window.
incorrect_answers: Release 1,000 captive salamanders into the white house.
